SEARCH
Module org.redsox.lancastersfx
Package org.redsox.lancastersfx.DatabaseConnectivity

Class RecipeDBConnectivity

java.lang.Object
org.redsox.lancastersfx.DatabaseConnectivity.ConnectivityDBImpl
org.redsox.lancastersfx.DatabaseConnectivity.RecipeDBConnectivity
public class RecipeDBConnectivity extends ConnectivityDBImpl
The RecipeDBConnectivity class extends ConnectivityDBImpl and provides methods for managing recipes in the database, including adding, removing, reviewing, approving, and adjusting recipes.

  • Method Details

    • addRecipe

      public void addRecipe(String recipeName, int chefId, HashMap<Integer,Float> ingredientAmountsMap) throws SQLException
      Adds a recipe to the database with the specified name, chef ID, and ingredient amounts.
      Parameters:
      recipeName - The name of the recipe.
      chefId - The ID of the chef who created the recipe.
      ingredientAmountsMap - A map containing ingredient IDs as keys and their respective amounts as values.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL execution fails.

    • removeRecipe

      public void removeRecipe(int recipeId) throws SQLException
      Removes a recipe from the database with the specified recipe ID.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe to remove.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL execution fails.

    • checkRecipeReviewal

      public boolean checkRecipeReviewal(int recipeId) throws SQLException
      Checks whether a recipe with the specified ID has been reviewed.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe to check.
      Returns:
      true if the recipe has been reviewed; otherwise, false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL execution fails.

    • checkRecipeApproval

      public boolean checkRecipeApproval(int recipeId) throws SQLException
      Checks whether a recipe with the specified ID has been approved.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe to check.
      Returns:
      true if the recipe has been approved; otherwise, false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL execution fails.

    • reviewRecipe

      public void reviewRecipe(int recipeId, boolean reviewed) throws SQLException
      Reviews a recipe, updating its review status.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe to review.
      reviewed - The new review status of the recipe.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the operation.

    • approveRecipe

      public void approveRecipe(int recipeId, boolean approved) throws SQLException
      Approves a recipe, updating its approval status.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe to approve.
      approved - The new approval status of the recipe.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the operation.

    • adjustRecipe

      public void adjustRecipe(int recipeId, Integer ingredientIdToAdd, Float amountToAdd, Integer ingredientIdToRemove) throws SQLException
      Adjusts a recipe by adding or removing ingredients.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe to adjust.
      ingredientIdToAdd - The ID of the ingredient to add (null if no ingredient is to be added).
      amountToAdd - The amount of the ingredient to add (null if no ingredient is to be added).
      ingredientIdToRemove - The ID of the ingredient to remove (null if no ingredient is to be removed).
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the operation.
